## Instructor of Record

### Economics of Investments: Stocks and Bonds (Summer 2026)
This course covers the fundamentals of stocks and bonds, including valuation methods and models. Introduces the analysis of financial statements and understanding the impact of macroeconomic factors on stock prices. Includes modern portfolio theory, teaching students how to construct efficient and diversified portfolios while balancing risk and return.
